name: SetPlayerSpecialAction
notes: Removing jetpacks from players by setting their special action to 0 causes the sound to stay until death.
description: This function allows to set players special action.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player that should perform the action

params_body.name: actionid
params_body.description: The action that should be performed.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player is not connected.
related_fn:
GetPlayerSpecialAction: Get a player's current special action.
 ApplyAnimation: Apply an animation to a player.
